title: WTB Joe Lake NYA Old Mill
author: garymc

posts.post_title: WTB Joe Lake NYA Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Last card I need to finish back run........
I'm starting to wonder if it exists ???

Hope you can help me out ????

Nice run Gary good luck with the Old Mill and SC350/25.

I'm not suggesting you need one but just letting you know 
there are some examples out there that are missing part
of the bottom of his name.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=329264&d=1537637925[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=329265&d=1537637939[/IMG]
Just picked up the SC350/25....now I only need the Old Mill !
Somebody must have one to sell ?????
